name: zastro-websockets
description: Use WebSockets in your Astro SSR Apps - Monorepo containing Node.js and Cloudflare adapters
author: Zach Handley

scripts.build: pnpm run build:adapters && pnpm run build:packages
scripts.test:node: pnpm install && pnpm run build && cd ./tests/projects/node && pnpm install && pnpm run build && cd ../../..
scripts.test:cloudflare: pnpm install && pnpm run build && cd ./tests/projects/cloudflare && pnpm install && pnpm run build && cd ../../..
scripts.test: pnpm install && pnpm run build && pnpm run test:node && pnpm run test:cloudflare
